msbt.message: We've completed the expansion of your lovely home. However, during construction, we had to place one or more wall-hanging items in your storage. Hope you understand.
I appreciate how you've helped prepare homes for new island residents. As a thank-you gift, I've included some fencing for your home. Good fences make good neighbors, after all!
A new resident moved to a plot you set up! As a small token of our appreciation, we've put 1,000 Nook Miles into your account. We hope you spend them on something that makes you happy.
Oh my! I'm feeling the music! So glad you came to K.K.'s concert. His memorable song Welcome Horizons is my gift to you. Pop it into an item that can play music, and enjoy it whenever you like!
To celebrate the opening of the new Resident Services building, we have lots of new miles-redemption items available. Plus, we now have a new service for Nook Miles+ members to earn 5x more miles!

I'm writing to advise you of some special Nook Miles+ activities that are available from now until May 4th. All part of our Nature Day event! Yes, yes! I do hope you'll come see me for more details, hm?
I would like nothing more than to give you this gift in person, but with Resident Services under construction, I've decided to leave your May Day Ticket with Orville. I hope you enjoy your excursion!

Great news! We've confirmed that the waters around our island are safe for swimming, so we're offering a new line of wet suits for sale. You can swim, dive, or simply kick back in your new suit. Enjoy!

All-new body paint and eye color options are available as Nook Miles redemption items at the Nook Stop in Resident Services. We hope you enjoy making all kinds of fun, new looks for your next costume party!
Sincerely, your friends at Nook Inc.
